name: Boss
moreInfo: Boss is an active dog who enjoys long walks and runs. He will be a great companion for anyone who enjoys outdoor activities.

name: Pince
moreInfo: Pince is really  gentle and are known for being patient with children.

name: Gigi
moreInfo: Dogs are capable of experiencing a wide range of emotions, including joy, fear, and sadness, and Gigi are often sensitive to their owner's emotions.

name: Jack
moreInfo: Many dogs, like Jack are protective of their owners and their territory, which can make them great guard dogs.

name: Molly
moreInfo: Dogs are known for their loyalty to their owners and Molly will definitely form strong bonds with other humans

name: Liza
moreInfo: Huskies are known for their unique howling and vocalizations. Liza may howl, bark, or make other noises to communicate with their owners.

name: Bosse
moreInfo: Bosse loves to play and enjoy toys, games, and activities with their owners

name: Fergie & Zac
moreInfo: This husky mix breed have a strong pack mentality and may display behaviors such as howling or digging if they are left alone for too long

name: King
moreInfo: King can be stubborn and strong-willed, which means they may require firm training and socialization to ensure they are well-behaved.

name: Angel
moreInfo: Angel is known for being independent and can be quite stubborn. She have a strong-willed personality and may require firm training.

name: Lexi
moreInfo: Lexi is really affectionate and often enjoy cuddling and being close to their owners.

name: Bonso
moreInfo: Bonso will make a great family pet because of her gentle nature and her love for human companionship.
